Posts.Content: Feb 22, 2016 06:24PM DLcygnet wrote: Hi! New to the Group. It looks like my first session (or at least final measurements & sim) will be March 8th. Looking at about 33 visits of whole breast radiation & 1 weeks worth of targeted boost. I'm glad this will be easier than Chemo, but I'm anxious that this will be the procedure with the most damaging and lasting effects (Assuming chemo hasn't rendered me sterile).
Posts.Title: Winter 2015-16 RADS mdoc524 kbutler
